Author: Beingstupidsince97
Text: Hi, I don’t think it’s a good idea to live with a friend that doesn’t understand your ED and doesn’t really respect your wishes. I think it could be damaging and make things worse tbh..   I think the best thing would be to tell him about the ED but i totally understand you not wanting to do that ofcourse! Maybe try to think of some other reason why the other housing option is better (like rent or something) and telling him that?

Author: bronwynmichele
Text: What would happen if you told him you were vegan and can’t eat anything with bacon fat or butter.
